name: dracaena
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a tropical bush or tree with lots of attractive long, thin leaves, often grown in a container inside a house or in a greenhouse (= building with a roof and sides made of glass) in the garden: With good care, Dracaenas will live for decades. Grown for its long, attractive foliage, Dracaena thrives in home environments with little care.
More examplesFewer examplesHaving a plant like a dracaena, spider plant, or peace lily will feed oxygen to your overworked brain.They placed an embargo on the importation of the Dracaena family plants to prevent further imports of the exotic pests.Dracaena is an attractive bushy plant with broad, strap-shaped leaves striped with gold down their centre.
